subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Three years after Iona’s 2-28 season, the Gaels are back in the business of winning. Their 17 victories are the most among the metro area’s 23 Division I teams.
snippet: Three years after Iona’s 2-28 season, the Gaels are back in the business of winning. Their 17 victories are the most among the metro area’s 23 Division I teams.
